unnormalised: Edu-Tech Buzz: Scholarship Portals – Your Ticket to a Brighter Future, Yaar!
normalised: Edu-Tech Buzz: Scholarship Portals – Your Ticket to a Brighter Future, Friend!

unnormalised: Forget slogging through endless websites, students! Finding scholarships just got easier thanks to a bunch of cool scholarship portals popping up. Think of them as Tinder for scholarships, but instead of dates, you're matching with funding for your dreams!
normalised: Forget slogging through endless websites, students! Finding scholarships just got easier thanks to a bunch of cool scholarship portals popping up. Think of them as Tinder for scholarships, but instead of dates, you are matching with funding for your dreams!

unnormalised: These platforms, like "Vidya Dhan" and "Shiksha Sahayak," are helping students across India, from Kanpur to Kochi, discover opportunities they might've missed. They aggregate info on everything from merit-based scholarships to those specifically for students from backward communities or those pursuing rare disciplines like Sanskrit Literature.
normalised: These platforms, like "Vidya Dhan" and "Shiksha Sahayak," are helping students across India, from Kanpur to Kochi, discover opportunities they might have missed. They aggregate info on everything from merit-based scholarships to those specifically for students from backward communities or those pursuing rare disciplines like Sanskrit Literature.

unnormalised: Imagine little Anjali from a small village in Rajasthan, finally getting a shot at IIT thanks to a scholarship she found on one of these portals! Many portals even offer career counseling sessions, which is awesome.
normalised: Imagine little Anjali from a small village in Rajasthan, finally getting a shot at I I T thanks to a scholarship she found on one of these portals! Many portals even offer career counseling sessions, which is awesome.

unnormalised: Heads up for upcoming deadlines folks! Remember the deadline for the "Sarva Shiksha Abhiyan" scholarship is 30/09/2024. Also, a webinar on scholarship application writing is scheduled for 14/07/2024 at 11:00 hrs. Some require income certificates below Rs. 2.5 Lakhs. Check each scholarship's eligibility properly. Applications can be submitted up to 17:00 hrs. Start your search NOW, and remember, luck favors the prepared mind! Jai Hind!
normalised: Heads up for upcoming deadlines folks! Remember the deadline for the "Sarva Shiksha Abhiyan" scholarship is thirtieth September two thousand and twenty four. Also, a webinar on scholarship application writing is scheduled for fourteenth July two thousand and twenty four at eleven zero zero hours. Some require income certificates below rupees two point five lakhs. Check each scholarship's eligibility properly. Applications can be submitted up to seventeen zero zero hours. Start your search NOW, and remember, luck favors the prepared mind! Hail India!
